languages.text: Тела прихожан и проповедников устилают палубу перед алтарем служения. Судя по состоянию трупов, нападавшие не гнушались даже выдирать импланты из еще живых жертв.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Барк про убитых проповедников и прихожан

languages.text: The deck before the altar is strewn with bodies of parishioners and preachers. Judging by their condition, the attackers were not above ripping implants from their still living victims.
languages.original_text: Тела прихожан и проповедников устилают палубу перед алтарем служения. Судя по состоянию трупов, нападавшие не гнушались даже выдирать импланты из еще живых жертв.

traits.locale_text: The deck before the altar is strewn with bodies of parishioners and preachers. Judging by their condition, the attackers were not above ripping implants from their still living victims.

The deck before the altar is strewn with bodies of parishioners and preachers. Judging by their condition, the attackers were not above ripping implants from their still living victims.

languages.text: 祭壇前のデッキには、信者とプリーチャーの体が散乱している。状態から判断すると、襲撃者たちはまだ生きている被害者からインプラントを引き裂くことを躊躇しなかったのであろう。
languages.original_text: The deck before the altar is strewn with bodies of parishioners and preachers. Judging by their condition, the attackers were not above ripping implants from their still living victims.

traits.locale_text: 祭壇前のデッキには、信者とプリーチャーの体が散乱している。状態から判断すると、襲撃者たちはまだ生きている被害者からインプラントを引き裂くことを躊躇しなかったのであろう。

languages.text: L'estrade de l'autel est jonchée des cadavres des paroissiens et des prêcheurs. Vu leur état, les attaquants n'ont pas attendu que les victimes rendent leur dernier souffle avant d'arracher leurs implants.
languages.original_text: The deck before the altar is strewn with bodies of parishioners and preachers. Judging by their condition, the attackers were not above ripping implants from their still living victims.

traits.locale_text: L'estrade de l'autel est jonchée des cadavres des paroissiens et des prêcheurs. Vu leur état, les attaquants n'ont pas attendu que les victimes rendent leur dernier souffle avant d'arracher leurs implants.

languages.text: 祭坛前面的区域散落着教区居民与布道士的尸体。从这些尸体的状况来看，那些袭击者在受害者还没死的时候，就把受害者身上的植入物扯了下来。
languages.original_text: The deck before the altar is strewn with bodies of parishioners and preachers. Judging by their condition, the attackers were not above ripping implants from their still living victims.

traits.locale_text: 祭坛前面的区域散落着教区居民与布道士的尸体。从这些尸体的状况来看，那些袭击者在受害者还没死的时候，就把受害者身上的植入物扯了下来。

languages.text: Das Deck vor dem Altar ist übersät mit Leichen von Gemeindemitgliedern und Priestern. Dem Zustand nach zu schließen, haben die Angreifer sogar ihren noch lebenden Opfern Implantate abgerissen.
languages.original_text: The deck before the altar is strewn with bodies of parishioners and preachers. Judging by their condition, the attackers were not above ripping implants from their still living victims.

traits.locale_text: Das Deck vor dem Altar ist übersät mit Leichen von Gemeindemitgliedern und Priestern. Dem Zustand nach zu schließen, haben die Angreifer sogar ihren noch lebenden Opfern Implantate abgerissen.

languages.text: La cubierta anterior al altar está plagada de cadáveres de feligreses y predicadores. A juzgar por su estado, a los asaltantes no les dio reparo arrancar los implantes de aquellas víctimas que aún vivían.
languages.original_text: The deck before the altar is strewn with bodies of parishioners and preachers. Judging by their condition, the attackers were not above ripping implants from their still living victims.

traits.locale_text: La cubierta anterior al altar está plagada de cadáveres de feligreses y predicadores. A juzgar por su estado, a los asaltantes no les dio reparo arrancar los implantes de aquellas víctimas que aún vivían.

languages.text: Sunağın önünde kalan güverte, cemaat mensuplarının ve vaizlerin cesetleriyle dolu. Durumlarına bakılırsa saldırganlar, hâlâ hayatta olan kurbanlarının implantlarını sökmekten geri durmamış.
languages.original_text: The deck before the altar is strewn with bodies of parishioners and preachers. Judging by their condition, the attackers were not above ripping implants from their still living victims.
